SEARCH
Package services.patient

Class MedicalBillingServicePatient

java.lang.Object
services.patient.MedicalBillingServicePatient
public class MedicalBillingServicePatient extends Object
This Service MedicalBillingServicePatient class handles the business logic of the app for Patient Menu It allows current patient to retrieve unpaid medical bills CreditCard Payment method to facilitate payment for the medical bills

    • retrieveUnPaidBills

      public void retrieveUnPaidBills()
      retrieveUnPaidBills() Allow patient to retrieve all the MedicalBill with status TransactionStatus UNPAID Uses PaymentService function to facilitate payment for the medical bills Incur an additional fee of $10 for late payment handle if patient input wrong type of input handle if patient did not input an integer for it to parse
